TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSchemaInfo extends System.Object implements class System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo

summary.span: 表示已验证的 XML 节点的后架构验证信息集。

span.span: Represents the post-schema-validation infoset of a validated XML node.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例 `contosoBooks.xml` 根据架构对文件进行验证 `contosoBooks.xsd` 。The following example validates the `contosoBooks.xml` file against the `contosoBooks.xsd` schema. 该示例使用 类反序列化 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件，并将节点的值传递给 类的方法。The example uses the class to deserialize the `contosoBooks.xml` file and pass the value of the nodes to the methods of the class. [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples/CS/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples/VB/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples.vb#1)] 该示例使用 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input. [!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xml#2)] 该示例还使用 `contosoBooks.xsd` 作为输入。The example also takes the `contosoBooks.xsd` as an input. [!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xsd#3)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示这个被验证的 XML 节点是否设置为在 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构验证期间应用的默认值的结果。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating if this validated XML node was set as the result of a default being applied during XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schema validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性不报告 DTD 默认值。The property does not report DTD defaults.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating if the value for this validated XML node is nil.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 XML 节点的属性为，则它的值为 nil `xsi:nil` `true` 。The value of an XML node is nil if its `xsi:nil` attribute is `true`.

summary.span: 获取或设置这个被验证的 XML 节点的动态架构类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the dynamic schema type for this validated XML node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当 xml 节点的静态类型是联合类型时，才设置属性，在这种情况下， 属性将从验证 XML 节点的联合返回类型。The property is set only if the static type of the XML node is a union type in which case the property will return the type from the union the XML node validated against.

span.span: Gets or sets the compiled object that corresponds to this validated XML node.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例 `contosoBooks.xml` 根据架构对文件进行验证 `contosoBooks.xsd` 。The following example validates the `contosoBooks.xml` file against the `contosoBooks.xsd` schema. 该示例使用 类反序列化 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件，并将节点的值传递给 类的方法。The example uses the class to deserialize the `contosoBooks.xml` file and pass the value of the nodes to the methods of the class. [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples/CS/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples/VB/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples.vb#1)] 该示例使用 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input. [!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xml#2)] 该示例还使用 `contosoBooks.xsd` 作为输入。The example also takes the `contosoBooks.xsd` as an input. summary.span: 获取或设置这个被验证的 XML 节点的静态 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the static XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schema type of this validated XML node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML 节点的静态类型是在 XSD 架构中声明的类型。The static type of an XML node is the type that was declared in the XSD schema. ## Examples 下面的示例 `contosoBooks.xml` 根据架构对文件进行验证 `contosoBooks.xsd` 。The following example validates the `contosoBooks.xml` file against the `contosoBooks.xsd` schema. 该示例使用 类反序列化 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件，并将节点的值传递给 类的方法。The example uses the class to deserialize the `contosoBooks.xml` file and pass the value of the nodes to the methods of the class. [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples/CS/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples/VB/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples.vb#1)] 该示例使用 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input. [!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xml#2)] 该示例还使用 `contosoBooks.xsd` 作为输入。The example also takes the `contosoBooks.xsd` as an input. [!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xsd#3)]
